function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Presence of core built environment microbiome dominated by specific bacterial in classrooms and office spaces may increase the concentration of airborne pathogens, leading to higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor sanitation
